metadata.title: CVE-2019-5419 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: There is a possible denial of service vulnerability in Action View (Rails)<5.2.2.1, <5.1.6.2, <5.0.7.2, <4.2.11.1 where specially crafted acceptheaders can cause action view to consume 100% cpu and make the serverunresponsive.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
